user.description: Ensure that your TV is turned on before trying to set it up.

authorize.title: Authorize Sony Bravia TV
authorize.description:
Enter the PIN code shown on the Sony Bravia TV. 

If the PIN code is not shown, you have to unregister Home Assistant on your TV, go to: Settings -> Network -> Remote device settings -> Deregister remote device. 

You can use PSK (Pre-Shared-Key) instead of PIN. PSK is a user-defined secret key used for access control. This authentication method is recommended as more stable. To enable PSK on your TV, go to: Settings -> Network -> Home Network Setup -> IP Control. Then check «Use PSK authentication» box and enter your PSK instead of PIN.
